title: PM grieved over martyrdom of policemen in Mastung terror attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed grief over the martyrdom of police personnel in a terrorist attack on a police van in Mastung district of Balochistan.
The prime minister prayed for peace for the martyred souls and strength for the bereaved families to bear the loss.
He directed that immediate medical assistance be provided to those injured in the attack.
Prime Minister Shehbaz said that the evil designs of terrorists undermining national security would be thwarted.
He reiterated that the government and security forces were determined to completely eradicate terrorism from the country.
